What I Do

I am a self-taught web developer, I learn programming code continuously, and I try to put things I learnt into practice as much as I can, I use any good resources to learn,from FreeCodeCamp,CodeAcademy,Udemy to Youtube videos and Docs,and I have online certifications, I am hardworking and I am always energetic and eager to learn new skills, I use a creative approach to problem solve, I have a tiny experience working as part of a team that lasted almost nine months, I work with the team to provide imaginative solutions for our customers. and I preserve the motivation to stay in touch with the code because of the passion I have to learn more.
